channel.title: Comments on: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError error on OpenBD when consuming a webservice
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Martin
item.dc:creator: Martin
item.description: Thanks so much for this! I have been ages wondering why my web application would not find the sun.tools.javac.Main on Tomcat and JDK 1.5 or 1.6, and adding the tools.jar to Tomcat/common/lib has sorted it! It's Friday and I can relax knowing this issue is solved for Monday! THANKS!
item.content:encoded: Thanks so much for this! I have been ages wondering why my web application would not find the sun.tools.javac.Main on Tomcat and JDK 1.5 or 1.6, and adding the tools.jar to Tomcat/common/lib has sorted it! It’s Friday and I can relax knowing this issue is solved for Monday! THANKS!
